org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Interface Host

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identificable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HostDynamicWorkload, PowerHost
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HostDynamicWorkloadSimple, HostSimple, NetworkHost, PowerHostSimple, PowerHostUtilizationHistory

    public interface Host
extends Identificable
    An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Physical Machines (Hosts) features. The interface implements the Null Object Design Pattern in order to start avoiding NullPointerException when using the NULL object instead of attributing null to Host variables.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Host NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Host objects.

                         List<Double> mipsShare)
        Allocates PEs for a VM.
        Parameters:
        vm - the vm
        mipsShare - the list of MIPS share to be allocated to the VM
        Returns:

        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true, if is suitable for vm

      • reallocateMigratingInVms

      • setPeStatus

        boolean setPeStatus(int peId,
                    Pe.Status status)
        Sets the particular Pe status on the host.
        Parameters:
        peId - the pe id
        status - the new Pe status
        Returns:
        true if the Pe status has changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)
        Precondition:
        peID >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • updateVmsProcessing

        double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime)
        Requests updating of cloudlets' processing in VMs running in this host.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - the current time
        Returns:
        expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs in this host or Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host
        Precondition:
        currentTime >= 0.0
        Postcondition:
        $none

        Returns:

        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none
